Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the charter and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the requirements of the campaign finance program for city elections, the requirements of transition and inauguration entities for candidates elected to the offices of mayor, public advocate, comptroller, borough president, and member of the city council, participation in the New York City Campaign Finance Program by self-funded candidates, the debate program, and limiting the use of government resources during an election year.
Items.MatterName: Requirements of the campaign finance program for city elections.

Items.MatterName: Requirements of the campaign finance program for city elections.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Gioia and Jackson
